name: Cloudy with a Chance of Fruit Ninja
name_original: Cloudy with a Chance of Fruit Ninja
description:
Cloudy with a Chance of Fruit Ninja

Fruits are falling! Ninja Frog is on the hunt to grab them all but wait- is that a morning star????

Use your arrow keys or WASD to move and press space bar to jump. Be careful to avoid those falling metal stars.

Credits - Unity Asset Store:

Casual Game BGM #5 - B.G.M

FREE Casual Game SFX Pack - Dustyroom

Pixel Adventure - Pixel Frog

Sunny Land - Ansimuz

Intro and End Screen Music

Pixel Galaxy - Snail's House
